Date: 2024-09-26 14:36
Subject: Are you ready to Transform Chalhoub?, How to Cope with Collective Grief & Uncertainty, Coffee with Wassim, Kick Off of IBTIKAR Programme, Staff Sale, The Deal Pop Up, Stella McCartney Sale & Versace Children's Pop Up
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/7XIEm0rwB0qEn0KX4RxWCQ/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/7XIEm0rwB0qEn0KX4RxWCQ/550421/FB0318E1A8653D462651374F1D575593/chalhoub-sports-day-6.png> 	

Are you ready to Transform Chalhoub?


Looking back to 2012, when we last transformed our processes and systems, the Group was very different. Today, we have more team members, across the globe, and a broader range of business models. However, our processes and the way we operate remain unchanged. 

Transform Chalhoub is set to revolutionize our operations by introducing innovative end-to-end business processes and state-of-the-art systems like SAP and Blue Yonder. The aim is to create a unified, efficient approach that aligns with market standards and best practices.

chunks.text:
Transform Chalhoub is set to revolutionize our operations by introducing innovative end-to-end business processes and state-of-the-art systems like SAP and Blue Yonder. The aim is to create a unified, efficient approach that aligns with market standards and best practices.

This transformation is much needed for our future success, and we count on your support as we move forward together. Stay tuned for exciting opportunities for you to be part of the programme! Together, we will LEARN, GROW and TRANSFORM!

Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.onechalhoub.com%252fNews%252f58854%252fare-you-ready-to-transform-chalhoub%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWQ4o3Kfhh6AJV08g%252b9oUqLO3UfcNefUEgL16MhCodYc0nWgRewsC4MW2Sga8VDiEu%252bJvXryhDzwE0sO40zTgUsepn6r7LDdkfQYxH2oVmZbktTPJBKSQbhIDtUSZXVeV0EHCUraOhZraoGC4JHnlFc8G9Kpn9XxISIllC3AY31YWhA4h%252fPjzYmdjT6IV1Y6tpu2ZgHyhEIcFkIrxsREAvde%252fs139aXgaqY3aQl5Qyd6v&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Caed8f71aad22439c04d708dcde1721ac%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638629438160432593%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=3hB74H0YqT36armS%2F0N7tvUcWqSFldn2yBveb%2BbqYQg%3D&reserved=0>

HOW TO COPE WITH COLLECTIVE GRIEF AND UNCERTAINTY

In light of the current crisis unfolding in Lebanon, The Lighthouse Arabia are offering a free support session tomorrow, at 10 AM, UAE time online led by a trauma expert, Farah Dahabi. The session is designed to provide trauma-informed guidance and support for those impacted.

In light of the current crisis unfolding in Lebanon, The Lighthouse Arabia are offering a free support session tomorrow, at 10 AM, UAE time online led by a trauma expert, Farah Dahabi. The session is designed to provide trauma-informed guidance and support for those impacted.

Register here <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.lighthousearabia.com%252fevents%252fcrisis-lebanon-how-cope-collective-grief-uncertainty-and-emotional-pain-community-support-session%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWQ4o3Kfhh6AJV08g%252b9oUqLO3UfcNefUEgL16MhCodYc0nWgRewsC4MW2Sga8VDiEu%252bJvXryhDzwE0sO40zTgUsepn6r7LDdkfQYxH2oVmZbktTPJBKSQbhIDtUSZXVeV0EHCUraOhZraoGC4JHnlFc8G9Kpn9XxISIllC3AY31YWhA4h%252fPjzYmdjT6IV1Y6tpu2ZgHyhEIcFkIrxsREAvde%252fs139aXgaqY3aQl5Qyd6v&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Caed8f71aad22439c04d708dcde1721ac%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638629438160456805%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=6snOjfc48Y2FjsRWZii8slf3AWI%2FuQjbwz6%2B3trohfs%3D&reserved=0>

Wednesday, October 2nd from 3 - 4 pm at D3, The Library.

Secure your spot to join us.

THE KICK OFF OF OUR IBTIKAR PROGRAMME

The IBTIKAR Programme is an intensive 8-week intra-preneurship training initiative designed to cultivate an innovation-driven culture within the Group. Through hands-on workshops, case studies and more, participants will gain the expertise to develop and drive innovative ideas within the organisation. Best of luck to our new cohort!
